description: This file defines a test case class for Self-Testing the sstate (shared state) functionality in the OpenEmbedded build system. It includes methods for setting up environment variables, configuring sstate directories and mirrors, and searching for sstate files based on regex patterns.

classes.name: SStateBase
classes.description: A test case class for self-testing sstate-related functionalities, derived from OESelftestTestCase.

methods.name: setUpLocal(self)
methods.description: Initializes environment variables and paths needed for sstate testing, based on build environment variables.

methods.name: config_sstate(self, temp_sstate_location=False, add_local_mirrors=[])
methods.description: Configures the sstate directory and optional mirrors for the test environment.

methods.name: search_sstate(self, filename_regex, distro_specific=True, distro_nonspecific=True)
methods.description: Searches for sstate files within the sstate directory matching the filename regex, optionally filtering by distro-specific and non-specific paths.
